scripts.dev: pnpm run build:packages && pnpm --filter core-service dev
scripts.prepare:saycast: pnpm run build:packages && cd apps/native-helper && swift build
scripts.start:saycast: pnpm run prepare:saycast && concurrently --kill-others --kill-others-on-fail --names core,hud --prefix-colors cyan,magenta "pnpm run dev:core" "pnpm run dev:hud"
